instructions:
Preheat charcoal or gas grill. In a small saucepan, heat jelly and garlic over medium heat until jelly is melted (or, in a microwave-safe bowl, heat in microwave oven at high power until melted, about 1 minute). Stir in cilantro. Set aside 1/4 cup mixture for serving.
Place ham steaks on grill over medium heat. Grill 3 minutes. Turn ham steaks; brush with half of remaining jelly mixture and continue to grill 3 minutes. Turn again; brush with remaining half of jelly mixture and continue to grill 1 to 2 minutes or until ham is glazed and heated through. Serve with reserved jelly mixture.
ingredients: 1 (2 pound) Cook's® brand Bone-In Thick Cut Ham Steak
title: Fiesta Grilled Ham Steak
